==== Barcamp Yangon and Other City / University Barcamp ====

==== Open Data and Open Street Map ====

 We support and Initiate OpenData, OpenGov and OpenStreetMap.
 
* Open Data (Yangon / Mandalay)
* Open Data 2nd, Openstreetmap, OSMand, Maps.me, Mapillary
* State of the Map (Mandalay) Openstreetmap, OSMand, Maps.me, Mapillary
* Map Edit Event (Yangon / Pyay / Mandalay / etc) OSMand, Maps.me, Mapillary

==== Arduino and Raspberry Pi ====

 We organize Raspberry Pi Myanmar Team, Arduino Day Yangon and Arduino Day Mandalay.
Any kind of event have Ubuntu Intro Topic, Ubuntu Both, Ubuntu DVD and Installation Guide.

* Raspberry Pi Intro Event
* Raspberry Pi Short Course
* Raspberry Pi BootCamp
* Raspberry Pi Jam
* Arduino Intro Event
* Arduino Short Course 
* Arduino BootCamp
* Arduino Days

=== Roadmap ===

* '''To expand''' 
** the ubuntu users community in our country
** --- planning local FOSS conferences in this year ---

** ï»¿Yangon City Development Committee (YCDC)
 This event was the one of our milestone in our Roadmap. YCDC has completly change the Ubuntu OS and we were act as the instructor at there.  
* '''To provide''' technical support and teaching about ubuntu by opening Ubuntu Introduction Courses.
   Note:    :Since internet connection in our country is terribly slow, we'll provide local repository servers in numerous places, to provide offline installation and updating.

* '''To publish''' a weekly journal about Ubuntu with <nowiki>[[http://www.myanmarinternetjournal.com/tech-inside/ubuntuqaaknowledge | Internet Journal]]</nowiki>.
* '''Ubuntu user guides''' for every new Ubuntu user from Myanmar 
* '''Making tutorial videos''' for local ubuntu users.
